context_text: <B> so we usually go for arranged marriages in our country so / <A> right / <B> my parents had looked for a guy and he is based in the us so i was working in india so uh both our parents decided that uh we should kind of uh start communicating together get to know each other through the net / <A> yes / <B> so i was quite okay with the idea and so this guy he wrote to me the first time i was pretty impressed with his mail and uh then he called me over once so i was like quite okay with the idea and then this kind of continued for over a period of two three months he would keep calling me up every day because it's more cheap to call from here than from india so he { would } / <A> [ yes ] / <B> me up so we would talk for about an hour half an hour and so on and uh he was pretty regular in his mails and from his mails i could make out that he liked me and he would often mention it in his mails as well and even i started developing a liking for him you know a kind of attachment develops / <A> yes / <B> when you are regularly communicating with a person { so it } / <A> [ yes ]
